summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement to adhere to robots.txt policies and mentions rate limiting based on IP addresses. It directs users towards the Government Publishing Office (GPO) for bulk data downloads, specifically via a provided link to the fdsys bulk data service. The bill essentially aims to regulate data scraping activities and promote responsible online data access, potentially protecting government websites from excessive and unregulated data extraction.
